short_summary: Amendment for Construction Services for the CSC SPP
description: Construction services for the manufacture and installation of an access stair on the roof of the CSC Regional Psychiatric Center (RPC) building in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan.
full_summary:
================

# [Government Tender Announcement](https://example.com/tender-announcement)

**Title:**
- English: Phase 1 - ITQ - EW038-230572 - CSC RPC Access Maintenance Stairs
- French: Phase 1 - ISQ - EW038-230572 - Escaliers d’accès et d’entretien au CPR de SCC

**Reference Number:**
WS3569063865-Doc3573915663

**Publication Date:** August 31, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** September 21, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT

**Notice Type:**
Request for Proposal

**Selection Criteria:**
- English: Lowest Price
- French: Prix le plus bas

**Trade Agreements:**
- English: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- French: Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

## Project Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide construction services for the manufacture and installation of an access stair on the roof of the CSC Regional Psychiatric Center (RPC) building in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan. The project involves a two-phase process:

1.  **Phase 1: Qualification Evaluation**
    In this phase, the PSPC will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers.
2.  **Phase 2: Financial Bid**
    After the qualification evaluation, the PSPC will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

## Important Details

- **Construction Time:** 21 weeks
- ** Submission Requirements:** All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by September 21, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT. Any submissions received after this time will be considered non-responsive.
- **Prequalification List:** The qualification list will expire within 90 days or upon award of a contract in Phase Two, whichever is earlier.

### Contact Information

- **Contact Name:** Alison Guilford, SPAC/PSPC
- **Contact Email:** [alison.guilford@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alison.guilford@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
